text: Cecilia Carolina Bolocco Fönck (born May 19, 1965 in Santiago, Chile) is a Chilean television presenter, actress, model, fashion designer, and former Miss Universe 1987 of italian and german origin. She is the older sister of Diana Bolocco. == Television == === Programs === Year Title Role Network Country 1988 Porque hoy es Sábado Co-hostess TVN Chile 1989 Martes 13 Co- hostess Canal 13 Chile 1990-1991 Telemundo CNN News presenter CNN en Español United States 1992-1993 Ocurrió así Hostess Telemundo United States 1992-1993 La Buena Vida Hostess Telemundo United States 1992-1993 Esta Noche con Cecilia Bolocco Hostess Telemundo United States 1995-2001 Viva el Lunes Hostess Canal 13 Chile 1996 Buenas Noches Cecilia Bolocco Hostess Canal 13 Chile 1999 La Noche de Cecilia Hostess Canal 13 Chile 2002 Aquí se pasa mundial Co-hostess Canal 13 Chile 2005 La Noche de Cecilia Hostess Mega Chile 2007 Fama Hostess Canal 13 Chile 2007 ¿Quién Cambia a Quién?
